text:
Of heart attack! Melina RamÃ­rez is seen in a bikini a few months after giving birth
Although the hostess confessed to feeling "tiny", the truth is that her millions of followers love Melina's current physical state.

05 Nov 2019

It is no secret to anyone that recovering the figure after a pregnancy is not easy, however, it seems that this was no major problem for the presenter Melina RamÃ­rez, who with just two months of giving birth to little Salvador already looks A body of heart attack.
So he let him see in his most recent post on his Instagram account, in which posing in a bikini reiterates once again that with exercise everything is achieved, there he also recognized that recovering his figure is a subject that handles without stress, which According to her it would be the key.
â€œRecovering the body after pregnancy is an issue that I handle without stress (and I think that is the key). I take care of myself and exercise obviously, but without anguish. All I can tell you is that training is the best! For health, physical or whatever they want, but do it, the body has memory and is very grateful, â€said the presenter in her post.
Although the caleÃ±a confessed that she still feels â€œlittleâ€, the truth is that her millions of followers love Melina's current physical state, because they pointed out that as she is now, she looks great.
"I'm still very little ðŸ— haha but I like it that way too ðŸ’œ," Melina concluded in her post that in less than two hours completed more than 113,000 interactions and hundreds of comments.
